page.title: 10STANSTED AIRPORT DEVELOPMENT
page.content: Grt Canfield{Anti-Airport Action Committee was elected at a public meeting called by the Parish Council in 1979 to canvass views on proposed expansion of airport. Meeting was opposed to any growth. Committee arranged fund raising events - dances, bonfire parties, sponsored walks. Proceeds have helped finance activities of North West Essex & East Herts Preservation Assocn. At the 3rd Public Inquiry to investigate merits of developmnt (1981-1983) 2 members of the group gave evidence and presented video film of village life. Government approval for expansion of airport given l985 initially for capacity of 8 million. Some local opinion favours fullest use existing capacity (currently underused) but not to extent that damages environment and lifestyle.
